movies.title: Mr. Nice
movies.plot: Biopic about 1970s Welsh marijuana trafficker Howard Marks, whose inventive smuggling schemes made him a huge success in the drug trade, as well as leading to dealings with both the IRA and British Intelligence. Based on Marks' biography with the same title.

events.title: Howard Marks smuggles 500kg of hash to New York
